016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.context;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.domainevents.helpers.entity.Command;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.CommonMetadata;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.DeploymentMetadata;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.Metadata;
022import com.exoreaction.xorcery.metadata.RequestMetadata;
023import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.node.ObjectNode;
024
025public record DomainEventMetadata(Metadata context)
026    implements CommonMetadata, RequestMetadata, DeploymentMetadata
027{
028    public DomainEventMetadata(ObjectNode metadata) {
029        this(new Metadata(metadata));
030    }
031
032    public record Builder(Metadata.Builder builder)
033        implements CommonMetadata.Builder<Builder>,
034            RequestMetadata.Builder<Builder>,
035            DeploymentMetadata.Builder<Builder>
036    {
037        public static DomainEventMetadata aggregateId(String aggregateId, Metadata metadata)
038        {
039            return new Builder(metadata).aggregateId(aggregateId).build();
040        }
041
042        public static DomainEventMetadata aggregateType(String aggregateType, Metadata metadata)
043        {
044            return new Builder(metadata).aggregateType(aggregateType).build();
045        }
046
047        public static DomainEventMetadata aggregate(String aggregateType, String aggregateId, Metadata metadata)
048        {
049            return new Builder(metadata)
050                    .aggregateType(aggregateType)
051                    .aggregateId(aggregateId)
052                    .build();
053        }
054
055        public Builder(Metadata metadata) {
056            this(metadata.toBuilder());
057        }
058
059        public Builder domain(String value)
060        {
061            builder.add("domain", value);
062            return this;
063        }
064
065        public Builder aggregateId(String value)
066        {
067            builder.add("aggregateId", value);
068            return this;
069        }
070
071        public Builder aggregateType(String name)
072        {
073            builder.add("aggregateType", name);
074            return this;
075        }
076
077        public Builder commandType(Class<? extends Command> commandClass)
078        {
079            builder.add("commandType", commandClass.getName());
080            return this;
081        }
082
083        public DomainEventMetadata build()
084        {
085            return new DomainEventMetadata(builder.build());
086        }
087    }
088
089    public String getDomain()
090    {
091        return context.getString("domain").orElse("default");
092    }
093
094    public String getAggregateType()
095    {
096        return context.getString("aggregateType").orElseThrow();
097    }
098
099    public String getAggregateId()
100    {
101        return context.getString("aggregateId").orElseThrow();
102    }
103
104    public String getCommandType()
105    {
106        return context.getString("commandType").orElseThrow();
107    }
108
109}
